Description of incident: A minor working at a McDonald's drive-thru repeatedly used a skimming device to obtain the credit card numbers of customers.  The dishonest employee swiped credit cards in the skimmer as customers paid for their meals throughout July and August.  The credit card information was then used by identity thieves to create duplicate cards with false names.  Investigators are actively looking for more victims.  Those who may have been affected should call the Sheriff's Office (763) 682-7733.
